concept.definition: The device was implanted in the patient during the procedure.
The device was explanted from the patient during the procedure.
The device remains in the patient, but its location, settings, or functionality was changed.

description: Example value set for Procedure Device Action code (what happened to a device during a procedure.
name: ProcedureDeviceActionCodes

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-action defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
implanted ImplantedThe device was implanted in the patient during the procedure.
explanted ExplantedThe device was explanted from the patient during the procedure.
manipulated ManipulatedThe device remains in the patient, but its location, settings, or functionality was changed.

title: Procedure Device Action Codes
